title: so i was dicking around on my day off
body:
and i apparently now own cherm.org

ideas for league related things i could put on it or simple things i could code for it that people would find useful?

--
some more info like i have the domain and an SSL cert that covers the entire root domain (i.e. not subdomains bc i'm only using that to get me a dank ass email of something@cherm.org). right now all it has is my discord bot for my friends to use being run off the VPN as well as an extremely basic mailserver (i.e. just pop3/smtp).

so yeah. ideas pls.
